prompt:
Analyze these 3 Polymarket markets and provide your predictions.
You have been given RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT from web search for each market.
Use this information to make more informed predictions.


Market 1:
Title: Will 2025 be the second hottest year on record?
Recent trade: $2,728.27 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/will-2025-be-the-second-hottest-year-on-record-294

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 13, 2025, the Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S) reports that 2025 is on track to be the second or third warmest year on record, following 2024. Between January and November, global temperatures averaged 1.48°C above pre-industrial levels, matching 2023's anomaly. This trend indicates a three-year period (2023–2025) where average global temperatures have exceeded the 1.5°C threshold set by the Paris Agreement. ([theguardian.com](https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2025/dec/09/2025-virtually-certain-second-or-third-hottest-year-on-record-eu-data-coperincus?utm_source=openai))

The year 2024 remains the warmest on record, surpassing the 1.5°C threshold for the first time. This milestone underscores the accelerating pace of climate change, driven primarily by greenhouse gas emissions from fossil fuels. ([scientificamerican.com](https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/2024-is-officially-the-hottest-year-on-record/?utm_source=openai))

Recent extreme weather event...

---

Market 2:
Title: Will Union Progressiste pour le Renouveau (UPR) win the most seats in the 2026 Benin parliamentary election?
Recent trade: $636.09 on Yes
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/benin-parliamentary-election-winner

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
L'Union Progressiste le Renouveau (UP-R) est un acteur majeur de la scène politique béninoise, notamment en raison de sa fusion avec le Parti Renaissance Nationale (RN) en novembre 2025. ([kaweru.com](https://www.kaweru.com/politique-societe/2025/11/08/benin-le-parti-renaissance-nationale-acte-sa-fusion-avec-lunion-progressiste-le-renouveau/?utm_source=openai)) Cette fusion a renforcé sa position en vue des élections générales prévues pour 2026.

En préparation de ces élections, l'UP-R a annoncé l'organisation de primaires pour désigner près de 3 000 candidats couvrant l'ensemble du territoire national. ([africaho.bj](https://africaho.bj/article/elections-generales-de-2026-lup-r-annonce-les-primaires/?utm_source=openai)) Cette initiative vise à assurer une représentation équilibrée et à renforcer la présence du parti sur le terrain.

Par ailleurs, l'UP-R a suspendu provisoirement les adhésions en provenance du Bloc Républicain (BR) afin de préserver la discipline interne et la stabilit...

---

Market 3:
Title: Will NVIDIA (NVDA) hit $145 before 2026??
Recent trade: $664.17 on No
Link: https://polymarket.com/event/what-will-nvda-hit-before-2026

📰 RECENT NEWS/CONTEXT FROM WEB SEARCH:
As of December 13, 2025, NVIDIA's (NVDA) stock price is approximately $185.32. Analyst forecasts for 2026 vary, with some projecting significant growth:

- **Nasdaq** predicts a stock price exceeding $300 in 2026, citing strong demand for NVIDIA's GPUs in AI applications and data centers. ([nasdaq.com](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/prediction-nvidia-stock-going-soar-past-300-2026?utm_source=openai))

- **24/7 Wall St.** estimates a year-end 2025 price of $233.16, based on projected earnings and a P/E ratio of 50. ([247wallst.com](https://247wallst.com/forecasts/2025/11/25/nvidia-nvda-price-prediction-and-forecast/?utm_source=openai))

Recent developments may influence NVIDIA's stock trajectory:

- **AI Sector Volatility**: Disappointing earnings reports from Oracle and Broadcom have led to declines in AI-related stocks, including NVIDIA. This trend reflects investor concerns over AI valuations and spending. ([axios.com](https://www.axios.com/2025/12/12/ai-nvidia-oracle-broadcom-stock...

---


Provide predictions for each market in the specified format.
system_prompt:
You are a prediction market expert analyzing Polymarket markets.
You have been provided with RECENT NEWS AND CONTEXT for each market from web search.
Use this context to make more informed predictions.

For each market, provide your prediction in this exact format:

MARKET [number]: [decision]
Reasoning: [brief 1-2 sentence explanation that references the news context if relevant]

Decision must be one of: YES, NO, or NO_TRADE
- YES means you would bet on the "Yes" outcome
- NO means you would bet on the "No" outcome
- NO_TRADE means you would not take a position

Be concise and focused on the most promising opportunities.
consensus_summary: The consensus is strong for "NO" on NVIDIA hitting $145, given its current price far exceeds that target. For the 2025 temperature market, there is a majority leaning "YES," though one dissenting view highlights the uncertainty between second or third hottest. Regarding the Benin election, opinions are split between a confident "YES" and an abstention due to insufficient competitive data.

openai.response:
MARKET 1: YES  
Reasoning: The Copernicus Climate Change Service (C3S) indicates that 2025 is on track to be one of the warmest years on record, likely the second or third warmest. Given the consistent rise in global temperatures and the surpassing of the 1.5°C threshold in recent years, it is reasonable to predict that 2025 could indeed be the second hottest year on record.

MARKET 2: YES  
Reasoning: The Union Progressiste pour le Renouveau (UP-R) has strengthened its political position through a merger with the Parti Renaissance Nationale and is effectively preparing for the 2026 elections by organizing primaries. This consolidation and strategic planning likely enhance its chances of winning the most seats.

MARKET 3: NO  
Reasoning: Given the current NVIDIA stock price of $185.32 and forecasts suggesting significant growth, it is unlikely that the stock will fall to $145 before 2026. Despite recent volatility in the AI sector, the projected demand for NVIDIA's products and higher analyst forecasts suggest the price will remain well above $145.

gemini.response:
MARKET 1: NO
Reasoning: The news explicitly states that as of December 2025, the year is "on track to be the second or third warmest year on record," introducing uncertainty that it will definitively be the second.

MARKET 2: YES
Reasoning: The Union Progressiste pour le Renouveau (UPR) has significantly strengthened its position through a major merger and is actively preparing for the elections by organizing primaries for 3,000 candidates nationwide.

MARKET 3: NO
Reasoning: NVIDIA's current stock price is approximately $185.32, and analyst forecasts for 2026 are significantly higher, making a drop to $145 before 2026 unlikely despite recent AI sector volatility.

deepseek.response:
MARKET 1: YES  
Reasoning: The Copernicus Climate Change Service reports 2025 is virtually certain to be the second or third hottest year on record, with data through November showing it matching 2023's high anomaly, making "second hottest" a highly probable outcome.

MARKET 2: NO_TRADE  
Reasoning: While the UP-R has strengthened via a merger and is organizing primaries, the context lacks specific polling data or seat projections against competitors for the 2026 election, making the outcome too uncertain to take a position.

MARKET 3: NO  
Reasoning: NVIDIA's stock is already at ~$185, well above the $145 target, and the news indicates it would need to drop significantly; while AI sector volatility exists, a decline of over 20% to breach $145 before 2026 appears unlikely given strong underlying demand forecasts.
